Naver Map App v5.3.8 >

■ App stabilization and bug fixes

Naver Map App v5.3.9 >

​■ Added a new Launcher mode
- Users can choose their favorite Launcher tab and make it open maximized when the app starts running.

■ Improved navigation
- Updated Launcher for navigation (Improved user interface, and added a feature to pin the current traffic conditions at the top​)
- Displays visual indications on the route bar, which helps users see traffic conditions, accidents/events, CCTV camera locations, at a glance while driving.
- Lets users find parking lots near their destinations and markers for parking lots automatically appear on the map screen.

■ Lets users quickly jump to a subway menu for subway searches with a short
■ Removed SmartAround from Around Me​
■ Improved stabilization and fixed bugs

Naver Map App v5.3.3 >

■ App stabilization and bug fixes

Naver Map App v5.3.7 >

■ App stabilization and bug fixes

NAVER Map v 5.1.1 >
■ Landscape mode available for Map
■ Designate selected location as starting point
■ Provide location-centered search option
■ Sort route results based on starting location
■ App stabilization and other bug fixes

■ Landscape mode available for Navigation
■ Screen auto-off prevention
■ Easy access to bus history and bus favorites from search bar

NAVER Map v 5.1.7 >
■ Improved usability for public transportation route results
■ More categories added to Around me (hospitals, bus stops, subway stations, hair salons)
■ Voting Booth Info for The 7th Nationwide Local Elections Available
■ Opening of Seohae Line(Sosa-Wonsi) (To be applied 6/16)
■ App stabilization and bug fixes​

NAVER Map v 5.1.7 >
■ Improved usability for public transportation route results
■ More categories added to Around me (hospitals, bus stops, subway stations, hair salons)
■ Voting Booth Info for The 7th Nationwide Local Elections Available
■ Opening of Seohae Line(Sosa-Wonsi) (To be applied 6/16)
■ App stabilization and bug fixes​

NAVER Map v 5.1.8 >
■ Search for gas stations around the guidance route
■ Add stop offs on the Route Search (for car, bike, & walking directions)
■ Summary info on the Car route details screen now includes stop offs
■ Number of buses shown on real time bus info for public transportation routes list changed (times for the following 2 buses shown)
■ App stabilization & bug fixes

Naver Map v 5.2.3 >

■ Launcher opening giveaway(September 20~30)

■ Home/ work(school) route buttons now provided in the search entry screen
■ Search result filter option (relevance/distance) saved to last selection

Naver Map v 5.2.4 >

■ Place related info in real time & Naver Reservation status info provided
- Info : Hotel & accommodations > price info, Baseball stadium > play schedule, ECV stations > charge status, Naver Reservation > reservation time & date
- Info provided on : Map screen, search result, place info page
■ Exposure level of Favorite places adjusted
■ App stabilization & bug fixes

Introducing Navermap ios CarPlay >
- iOS version 12 or above
- CarPlay compatible vehicles  (AVN system) needed
- via USB connection

Introducing Navermap ios CarPlay >
- iOS version 12 or above
- CarPlay compatible vehicles  (AVN system) needed
- via USB connection

■ Add Quick Actions to quickly go to major functions

Naver Map App v5.3.1>

■ Improved Favorites
- Added nickname function when saving a place to Favorites
- Add a place to more than one list (prev. Folder)
- Added place Memo function
- Improved functionality to edit Favorites and frequented places
■ Improved public transportation guidance
- Added departure time on/off option
- Added filter list option for public transit route (recommended, less walking, less transfers, quickest)
■ Traffic conditions CCTV streaming available in high def
- View real-time traffic conditions with better resolution
- Some locations only provided in VOD based on feed provider conditions
■ App stabilization and bug fixes

Naver Map App v5.3.1>

■ Improved Favorites
- Added nickname function when saving a place to Favorites
- Add a place to more than one list (prev. Folder)
- Added place Memo function
- Improved functionality to edit Favorites and frequented places
■ Improved public transportation guidance
- Added departure time on/off option
- Added filter list option for public transit route (recommended, less walking, less transfers, quickest)
■ Traffic conditions CCTV streaming available in high def
- View real-time traffic conditions with better resolution
- Some locations only provided in VOD based on feed provider conditions
■ App stabilization and bug fixes

Naver Map App v5.3.4 >

■ Added automatically use my location as start point option when using route search.
■ Improved flow for editing frequently visited places such as home, work, etc.​
■ Showing city/county/district average gas info provided in gas station detail info
■ Added recent route list to search wait screen
■ According to the 「Information and Communication Network Act」, the consent of the legal representative is required when collecting personal information of children under the age of 14 years

Naver Map App v5.3.4 >

■ Added automatically use my location as start point option when using route search.
■ Improved flow for editing frequently visited places such as home, work, etc.​
■ Showing city/county/district average gas info provided in gas station detail info
■ Added recent route list to search wait screen
■ According to the 「Information and Communication Network Act」, the consent of the legal representative is required when collecting personal information of children under the age of 14 years

Naver Map App v5.3.5 >

■ App stabilization and bug fixes

Naver Map App v5.3.5 >

■ App stabilization and bug fixes

Naver Map App v5.3.6 >

■ Added the Smart Around feature searching for nearby places
​■ Supports various icon colors to represent Favorites (12 colors available)
​■ Improved user interfaces for buses
​- Applied different designs to different kinds of buses (e.g., village buses, airport limousine buses)
​ - Changed icon colors for green buses and village buses to prevent further confusion caused by similarity of colors
​ - Added information about buses for daily commute and buses that operate on holidays and early dawn only
​■ Improved information about the route of public transportation
​ - Added information about the subway door to get off, bus route link, and the bus stop number to get off
​ - Lets users customize the order of routes and remembers the last custom setting
​■ (CarPlay) Added images about road lanes and crossroads (iOS 12.2 or higher)
■ ​Improved stabilization and fixed bugs

Naver Map App v5.3.6 >

​■ Improved user interfaces for buses

​ - Changed icon colors for green buses and village buses to prevent further confusion caused by similarity of colors
​ - Added information about buses for daily commute and buses that operate on holidays and early dawn only
​■ Improved information about the route of public transportation
​ - Added information about the subway door to get off, bus route link, and the bus stop number to get off
​ - Lets users customize the order of routes and remembers the last custom setting
​■ (CarPlay) Added images about road lanes and crossroads (iOS 12.2 or higher)
■ ​Improved stabilization and fixed bugs

Naver Map app version 5.5.0 >

■ Added a feature, Continue Directions

■ Provides enriched information about buses in real time

■ Shows estimated times for subway directions

■ Improved Directions (direction finder) for car directions
- Improved user interfaces for route lines/route summary card
- Shows a traffic congestion and CCTV footage on route lines

■ Add a menu, MY Place
- Added a feature that lets people write place reviews after providing receipts as proof of payment

Naver Map app version 5.5.0 >

■ Added a feature, Continue Directions

■ Provides enriched information about buses in real time

■ Shows estimated times for subway directions

■ Improved Directions (direction finder) for car directions
- Improved user interfaces for route lines/route summary card
- Shows a traffic congestion and CCTV footage on route lines

■ Add a menu, MY Place
- Added a feature that lets people write place reviews after providing receipts as proof of payment

Naver Map app version 5.6.0 >

■Improved place search
- Improved user interfaces for showing the list and details of stores as search results

■Improved Walking
- An icon appears for showing directions at the crossroads and pedestrian crossing facilities
- Provides Map View for users to see the map and the route together
​
■Improved Transit
- Route summary: Improved user interfaces based on time bar design and first departure information
- Route Details & Area Details: Provides a tab on the Details screen, allowing users to compare and navigate a path. Enables users to instantly find info. about the first public transit with a speech balloon
​
■Updated Navigation
- Shows an alternate route while driving
- Provides information about route changes(time, fare, and so on)
​
■Updated 'MY Place'
- Discover Tab: You can find and save people's lists.
- List Tab: You can manage and share your lists.

Naver Map app version 5.6.0 >

■Improved place search
- Improved user interfaces for showing the list and details of stores as search results

■Improved Walking
- An icon appears for showing directions at the crossroads and pedestrian crossing facilities
- Provides Map View for users to see the map and the route together
​
■Improved Transit
- Route summary: Improved user interfaces based on time bar design and first departure information
- Route Details & Area Details: Provides a tab on the Details screen, allowing users to compare and navigate a path. Enables users to instantly find info. about the first public transit with a speech balloon
​
■Updated Navigation
- Shows an alternate route while driving
- Provides information about route changes(time, fare, and so on)
​
■Updated 'MY Place'
- Discover Tab: You can find and save people's lists.
- List Tab: You can manage and share your lists.

■ Improved stabilization and fixed bugs

Naver Map app version 5.7.0 >

■Changed how search results are sorted
- Search results for places are always displayed by "Map centered" and "Relevance" by default as long as you do not change the option.
■Improved navigation
- Added additional information about the rest area, such as degree of congestion, facilities, and regional dishes.
■Improved stabilization and fixed bugs

■Improved navigation guide

■Improved stabilization and fixed bugs

■ Improved bus number search
- Instant results when you search bus numbers
■ Improved driving directions
- Estimated time of arrival based on departure time when you select “Depart later”
■ Improved navigation
- Change route from all available routes by checking “See routes”
- Addition of ‘EV’ to fuel settings; find EV charging stations while driving
- Improved ‘Settings’ screen UI
■ Improved app accessibility (first update)
■ Bug fixes and improved app stability

■ Improved Menu tab for Map home
- [Nearby] Info about restaurants and places to visit provided by user data
- [Transit] Add stations/buses to Favorites
- [Transit/Navi] Check fast commute routes by tab
- [Transit/Navi] Directions to destinations and urgent notifications in real-time
